short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support your chosen good cause everytime you shop online at no cost to you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wishgenie allows you to fundraise for your school or charity just by shopping online. With Wishgenie installed youâ€™ll never miss a donation again!
You can shop at any of your favourite retailers such as Amazon, John Lewis, Debenhams or Play.com and they will donate a percentage of anything you spend to your chosen good cause at no cost to you! Wishgenie works with 280,000 UK charities and 32,000 schools.
On average the retailer will donate 3.5% of anything you spend online to your chosen cause, but with some items such as insurance, holidays or clothes the donations can be much higher. And because Wishgenie works with most UK supermarkets you can make a cost-free donation every week when you do your weekly grocery shopping too.
To find out more please visit: 
www.wishgenie.com
